docs.snippet: In a new book, Heather Rogers warns of the dangers of buying into green euphoria and says green capitalism is undermining ecological progress.

docs.snippet: Readers have a love/hate relationship with couples expressing affection in public places.
docs.lead_paragraph: If our critical attitude toward politicians, athletes and their illicit lovers are any indication, it seems we here in the United States suffer from what some may call a repressed sense of sexual freedom. Not unrelated, Americans traditionally have a low tolerance for public displays of affection, perhaps a vestige of our Puritanical heritage.
docs.abstract: Readers have a love/hate relationship with couples expressing affection in public places.

headline.main: Kissing in Public, a Touchy Subject for Readers
